00028 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00029 #include "kvi_bswap.h"
00030 #include "kvi_inttypes.h"
00031 
00032 
00033 //
00034 // Byte Orders Reminder
00035 //   Number                             0xaabbccdd
00036 //   Little Endian Stores               0xdd 0xcc 0xbb 0xaa
00037 //   Big Endian Stores                  0xaa 0xbb 0xcc 0xdd
00038 //   Perverse Middle Endian             0xbb 0xaa 0xdd 0xcc or another braindamaged combination (unsupported)
00039 //   Network Byte Order is Big Endian
00040 //   Intel Stuff uses Little Endian
00041 //   PPC is Big Endian
00042 //   Universal binaries on MacOSX use both Big and Little Endian
00043 //
00044 
00045 #ifdef BIG_ENDIAN_MACHINE_BYTE_ORDER
00046         #define kvi_localCpuToLittleEndian16(u) kvi_swap16((kvi_u16_t)(u))
00047         #define kvi_localCpuToLittleEndian32(u) kvi_swap32((kvi_u32_t)(u))
00048         #define kvi_localCpuToLittleEndian64(u) kvi_swap64((kvi_u64_t)(u))
00049         #define kvi_littleEndianToLocalCpu16(u) kvi_swap16((kvi_u16_t)(u))
00050         #define kvi_littleEndianToLocalCpu32(u) kvi_swap32((kvi_u32_t)(u))
00051         #define kvi_littleEndianToLocalCpu64(u) kvi_swap64((kvi_u64_t)(u))
00052 #else
00053         // We ASSUME that the local cpu is little endian.. if it isn't.. well :)
00054         #define LOCAL_CPU_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00055         #define kvi_localCpuToLittleEndian16(u) (u)
00056         #define kvi_localCpuToLittleEndian32(u) (u)
00057         #define kvi_localCpuToLittleEndian64(u) (u)
00058         #define kvi_littleEndianToLocalCpu16(u) (u)
00059         #define kvi_littleEndianToLocalCpu32(u) (u)
00060         #define kvi_littleEndianToLocalCpu64(u) (u)
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 
00064 #endif // !_KVI_BYTEORDER_H_
